description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，第十三届全国人民代表大会辽宁地区代表。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a delegate from the Liaoning region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省济南市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Jinan City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 侯漫路是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Hou Manlu is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，侯漫路当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会辽宁地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Hou Manlu was elected as a delegate from the Liaoning region to the 13th National People's Congress.
Hou Manlu is from Pingyin, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 平阴县是山东省的一个县。
description.en: Pingyin County is a county in Shandong Province.
